name: Manchego
description:
Controls :

Mouse Click or Space Bar 

Content :
  • 1 level
  • 7 pieces of cheese to find
  • 1 friend to save
  • input system similar to morse code
Help : 

To create an input, the 2 first characters represent the 4 directions :
( . . ) ( . _ ) ( _ . ) ( _ _ )
You can then add a ( _ ) at the end of those to pick something up in that direction.

Setup :

1930s France,
The national reserve of cheese are coming to an end, and thus the French Empire is resorting to ultimate means to refill the reserve. With a plan which no one thought possible. The french successfully managed to send the first radio operated robots on the moon, also known as the queen of all cheese. For 2 years now those robots have been harvesting cheese, controlled by operators in Lyon, you play as one of them.

More :

This game was created for the 49th edition of the Ludum Dare. My goal with this project was to create a game that could be played using only one button. Since it's a jam and I started kinda late, it's more an experiment then a game really. Though I'm really pleased with the final result. I did have a lot more ideas for other interactions and different commands,etc.. but that might be for another time.

This game was entirely made on a Raspberry Pi 4 Model B, using the Godot Engine.
